subjects.name: Algorithms
subjects.description: Design and analysis of algorithms, complexity theory, sorting, searching, graph algorithms

subjects.name: Data Structures
subjects.description: Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, hashing

subjects.name: Programming & Data Structures
subjects.description: C/C++/Java programming, object-oriented programming, data structure implementation

subjects.name: Computer Organization & Architecture
subjects.description: CPU design, memory hierarchy, instruction sets, pipelining, cache memory

subjects.name: Operating Systems
subjects.description: Process management, memory management, file systems, synchronization

subjects.name: Database Management Systems
subjects.description: Relational databases, SQL, normalization, transactions, indexing

subjects.name: Computer Networks
subjects.description: Network protocols, OSI model, TCP/IP, routing, network security

subjects.name: Theory of Computation
subjects.description: Finite automata, regular languages, context-free grammars, Turing machines

subjects.name: Compiler Design
subjects.description: Lexical analysis, syntax analysis, semantic analysis, code generation

subjects.name: Software Engineering
subjects.description: Software development life cycle, testing, project management, design patterns

subjects.name: Discrete Mathematics
subjects.description: Set theory, logic, combinatorics, graph theory, number theory

subjects.name: Linear Algebra
subjects.description: Matrices, vector spaces, eigenvalues, linear transformations

subjects.name: Probability & Statistics
subjects.description: Probability distributions, statistical inference, hypothesis testing

subjects.name: Digital Logic
subjects.description: Boolean algebra, logic gates, combinational and sequential circuits
